name: ListAuthorizationServersByTrustedType
description:
List associated authorization servers by trusted type.

Use this tool to retrieve all authorization servers associated with a specific trusted type for a given `authServerId`.

parameters.name: authorization_server_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Authorization Server to retrieve associated servers for.

parameters.name: search_name_or_audience
parameters.description: A string to search for the name or audience of associated authorization servers.

value_schema.description: Searches for the name or audience of the associated authorization servers

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Specifies the number of results to return per page.

value_schema.description: Specifies the number of results for a page

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: Specifies the cursor for fetching the next page of authorization servers.

value_schema.description: Specifies the pagination cursor for the next page of the associated authorization servers

parameters.name: search_trusted_authorization_servers
parameters.description: Set to `true` to search for trusted authorization servers, or `false` for untrusted ones.

value_schema.description: Searches trusted authorization servers when `true` or searches untrusted authorization servers when `false`

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the okta API.

parameters.name: trusted
parameters.description: Searches trusted authorization servers when `true` or searches untrusted authorization servers when `false`

value_schema.description: Searches trusted authorization servers when `true` or searches untrusted authorization servers when `false`

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Searches for the name or audience of the associated authorization servers

value_schema.description: Searches for the name or audience of the associated authorization servers

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specifies the number of results for a page

value_schema.description: Specifies the number of results for a page

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Specifies the pagination cursor for the next page of the associated authorization servers

value_schema.description: Specifies the pagination cursor for the next page of the associated authorization servers

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
